creditline: Gift of Mom, Mary Haldeman Dayton, and her family
description: Square at center of lower half; lower two-thirds of square is orange with two light-orange squares positioned at upper half, capped with rectangular forms in gray and black; silver metal frame
provenance: Mary Haldeman Dayton, Long Lake, Minn. (until d. 2010); estate of Mary Haldeman Dayton (2010; given to MIA)
title: Misuratori
